languages.text: "Я помню тебя, маленький ксенос. Помню, как ты и твои собратья молили о пощаде, когда, одного за другим, я отправлял{mf||а} вас на пир к Властелину Удовольствий".
"I remember you, little xenos. I remember you and your kin begging for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."
languages.original_text: "Я помню тебя, маленький ксенос. Помню, как ты и твои собратья молили о пощаде, когда, одного за другим, я отправлял{mf||а} вас на пир к Властелину Удовольствий".

traits.locale_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I remember you and your kin begging for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

traits.locale_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I remember you and your kin begging for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

languages.text: «Te recuerdo, pequeña xenos. Recuerdo cómo tu gente y tú suplicasteis piedad conforme os enviaba uno a uno al banquete del Señor del Placer».
languages.original_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I remember you and your kin begging for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."

traits.locale_text: «Te recuerdo, pequeña xenos. Recuerdo cómo tu gente y tú suplicasteis piedad conforme os enviaba uno a uno al banquete del Señor del Placer».
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

languages.text: « Je me souviens de vous, xénos. Je me souviens de vous et de vos semblables, en train de me demander grâce tandis que je vous envoyais, un à un, entre les mains du Prince du Plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I remember you and your kin begging for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."

traits.locale_text: « Je me souviens de vous, xénos. Je me souviens de vous et de vos semblables, en train de me demander grâce tandis que je vous envoyais, un à un, entre les mains du Prince du Plaisir. »
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

languages.text: 「お前のことは覚えてるよ、ちっぽけな異種族。お前とお仲間を次から次へとロード・オヴ・プレジャーの饗宴に送ってやった時の、慈悲を乞う姿をな」
languages.original_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I remember you and your kin begging for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のことは覚えてるよ、ちっぽけな異種族。お前とお仲間を次から次へとロード・オヴ・プレジャーの饗宴に送ってやった時の、慈悲を乞う姿をな」
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

languages.text: “我记得你，小异形。我还记得，当我把你和你的族人一个个送到欢愉之主的盛宴时，你们是怎么跪在我面前祈求怜悯的。”
languages.original_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I remember you and your kin begging for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."

traits.locale_text: “我记得你，小异形。我还记得，当我把你和你的族人一个个送到欢愉之主的盛宴时，你们是怎么跪在我面前祈求怜悯的。”
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

languages.text: "Ich erinnere mich an Euch, kleine Xenos. Ich erinnere mich daran, wie Ihr und Eure Sippe um Gnade gefleht habt, als ich Euch einen nach dem anderen zum Gelage des Lords der Vergnügungen geschickt habe."
languages.original_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I remember you and your kin begging for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erinnere mich an Euch, kleine Xenos. Ich erinnere mich daran, wie Ihr und Eure Sippe um Gnade gefleht haben, als ich Euch einen nach dem anderen zum Gelage des Lords der Vergnügungen geschickt habe."
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

languages.text: "Seni hatırlıyorum minik zeno. Soydaşlarınla birlikte sizi teker teker Zevk Lordu'nun ziyafetine yollarken nasıl da merhamet için yalvardığınızı hatırlıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I remember you and your kin begging for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."
